info.text: Your internet traffic is routed through MiMiC's technology so it can be intelligently handled, and achieves resilience through being located worldwide.
Your office is where the journey begins, and where your business is run using Internet data and applications.
Your connection, a constrained and limited resource, is your gateway to the world, and usually has no concept of what's important to your business.
Without traffic prioritisation, all applications and destinations are treated equally.
In this uncontrolled scenario, your important traffic might not get through unimpeded.
Using the MiMiC technology, traffic that is more important to you is given priority over other traffic.
With intelligent traffic prioritisation implemented, non-essential and non-urgent traffic will cause fewer problems.
